DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy safety BLS-ILB-E710c fertile woman Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia ( CIN3 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study BLS_ILB_E710c Fertile Women With Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia ( CIN3 )
DOC.detailed_description: This study see regression rate Cervical Intraepithelial Neoplasia ( CIN3 ) see inducement Cytotoxic T Lymphocyte . The First treatment group administer BLS-ILB-E710c 500mg 8 week follow 1 week observation The Second treatment group administer BLS-ILB-E710c 1000mg 8 week follow 1 week observation The Third treatment group administer BLS-ILB-E710c 1500mg 8 week follow 1 week observation The fourth treatment group administer BLS-ILB-E710c Optimum dose 8 week follow 8 week observation
